sentences.sContent: Francis is the same age as me.
Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.sCn: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.sContent: Dad retired at the age of 56.
...Even in the age of open-plan offices and social networks some work is best left to the individual...
...It was like living in an age you could never have imagined...
...We have presidential candidates running for their first term in office at age 68...
...Life Reimagined paints a picture of middle age that is far from gloomy...
...she claimed that she could recall every day of her life since the age of 12...
...scientists are increasingly learning that aging and biological age are two different things...
...A golden or lucky birthday is when one turns the age of their birth date...
...This may not be surprising given that this is the age range when women have children...
...It's also the age range when many women are trying to balance careers and home...

synos.tran: 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段
使成熟；使变老，使上年纪

phrases.pCn: 随着年龄的增长；因年久

words.tran: 年老的；…岁的；老年人特有的
歧视老年人（尤指在就业和住房方面）
老化（age的过去式）；成熟；变老

trans.tranOther: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older
